SPAIN TO SUSPEND LEMON EXPORTS FROM THURSDAY

Spain's citrus management committee said it was suspending lemon exports from Thursday in view of the likelihood of new European Community tariffs. A committee spokesman said the body would meet next week to review the situation and decide whether to lift the suspension. Reuter
